meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, TX

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the March 27, 2024 City Council Meeting
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Settlement of Claim Against Atlantic Specialty Insurance Company
agenda_items.description: Authorize settlement of the claim asserted by the City of Dallas against surety Atlantic Specialty Insurance Company for Sisters Asphalt, Inc.'s failure to complete construction under Dallas Water Utilities Contract No. 20-473/474.

agenda_items.title: Amendment to Emergency Vehicles Code
agenda_items.description: An ordinance amending Chapter 15D of the Dallas City Code regarding emergency vehicles.

agenda_items.title: Amendment to Transportation for Hire Code
agenda_items.description: An ordinance amending Chapter 47A of the Dallas City Code regarding transportation-for-hire rates and fares.

agenda_items.title: Contract for Professional Consulting Services
agenda_items.description: Authorize a two-year contract with Freese and Nichols, Inc. for professional consulting services.
agenda_items.presenter: Department of Planning and Urban Design

agenda_items.title: Condemnation Proceedings for Water Distribution Division
agenda_items.description: Authorize deposit of the amount awarded by the Special Commissioners in the condemnation proceedings for land acquisition.

agenda_items.title: Acquisition for West Dallas Gateway Project
agenda_items.description: Authorize acquisition of land for the West Dallas Gateway Project.

agenda_items.title: Grant for Composting Facility Feasibility Study
agenda_items.description: Authorize acceptance of a grant for a feasibility study for a composting facility.

agenda_items.title: Amendment to Advance Funding Agreement
agenda_items.description: Authorize Amendment No. 1 to the Advance Funding Agreement with the Texas Department of Transportation.

agenda_items.title: ArtsActivate 2025 Program
agenda_items.description: Authorize the ArtsActivate 2025 Program to support art and cultural services in the City of Dallas.

financial_items.description: Settlement of claim against Atlantic Specialty Insurance Company
Contract for professional consulting services with Freese and Nichols, Inc.
Acquisition for West Dallas Gateway Project
Grant for Composting Facility Feasibility Study
Amendment to Advance Funding Agreement with Texas Department of Transportation
